theme.concept: hand-drawn square with single vertical line positioned four-fifths of the way from left edge, dividing into large left section and small right section
theme.visual_metaphor: Pareto 80-20 principle showing 80% on left side and 20% on right side

transformation.to: divided with line at 80% mark from left

composition.focal_point: the dividing line showing unequal proportions

colors.distribution: black line drawing on white background, hand-drawn sketch aesthetic

style.shapes: square with vertical dividing line one-fifth from right edge

elements.foreground: single square outline with one vertical line positioned 80% from left edge (4/5 of the way across), creating large left section and narrow right section
elements.background: pure white seamless background with no shadows or gradients
key_objects: vertical line at 80% mark from left

metadata.name: eighty-twenty-square
metadata.use_case: 80/20 Pareto principle diagram for slide presentation
metadata.notes: Simple hand-drawn square with vertical line showing 80-20 division, no text
